snippet: With discouraging data on both sides of the Atlantic, European officials face heightened pressure to follow through on shoring up financially vulnerable countries.
lead_paragraph: With discouraging data on both sides of the Atlantic, European officials face heightened pressure to follow through on shoring up financially vulnerable countries.

headline.main: For Europe’s Markets, Latest Gloom Is From U.S.
headline.print_headline: For Europe’s Markets, Latest Gloom Is From U.S.
